meta.description: Determine 4 out of 5 workers to complete 4 tasks minimizing total working hours.

params.name: time
params.description: Time required for each worker to complete each task

vars.name: x
vars.description: 1 if worker is assigned to task, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(time[w][t] * x[w][t] for w in ['I', 'II', 'III', 'IV', 'V'] for t in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D'])

constraints.name: task_assignment_A
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task A

constraints.name: task_assignment_B
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task B

constraints.name: task_assignment_C
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task C

constraints.name: task_assignment_D
constraints.description: Exactly one worker must be assigned to task D

constraints.name: worker_limit_I
constraints.description: Worker I can be assigned to at most one task

constraints.name: worker_limit_II
constraints.description: Worker II can be assigned to at most one task

constraints.name: worker_limit_III
constraints.description: Worker III can be assigned to at most one task

constraints.name: worker_limit_IV
constraints.description: Worker IV can be assigned to at most one task

constraints.name: worker_limit_V
constraints.description: Worker V can be assigned to at most one task

constraints.name: total_workers
constraints.description: Exactly 4 workers must be assigned in total
